creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
I try to edit a page of the default publication with Kupu and save it. A dialog 
box appears and tells me: "Response status: 1223"

creator: roku@apache.org
text: This is a known issue in Kupu. There are lots of postings in kupu mls about it.

I am not convinced that this entry should be Closed/Invalid but I leave it like 
that for the moment.

When resolving such a bug as Invalid because its origin is a "foreign" 
component one should make sure that a bug entry exists in the corresponding bug 
tracker.

I did not find an entry for this bug in the Kupu issue tracker
http://codespeak.net/issues/kupu/
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
